ARABIC: وَرُسُلًا قَدْ قَصَصْنَٰهُمْ عَلَيْكَ مِن قَبْلُ وَرُسُلًا لَّمْ نَقْصُصْهُمْ عَلَيْكَ وَكَلَّمَ ٱللَّهُ مُوسَىٰ تَكْلِيمًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There are Messengers We have already told you about and Messengers We have not told you about; and Allah spoke directly to Musa -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And to many an apostle We have mentioned before, and to many other apostles We have not mentioned to you; and to Moses God spoke directly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We revealed to the Messengers We have already told you of, and to the Messengers We have not told you of; and to Moses Allah spoke directly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (We sent revelations to) the Messengers mentioned to you before and also to Messengers who have not been mentioned to you. God spoke to Moses in words.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And to the Noble Messengers whom We have mentioned to you before, and to the Noble Messengers We have not mentioned to you; and Allah really did speak to Moosa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Messengers We have mentioned to you before, and Messengers We have not mentioned to you, and to Musa Allah spoke directly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And (We sent) apostles We have mentioned to you before and apostles we have not mentioned to you; and to Musa, Allah addressed His Word, speaking (to him):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and Messengers We have already told thee of before, and Messengers We have not told thee of; and unto Moses God spoke directly --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And messengers We have mentioned unto thee before and messengers We have not mentioned unto thee; and Allah spake directly unto Moses;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have told you about some messengers sent previously, while We have not yet told you about others. God spoke to Moses directly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We Revealed unto apostles of some of whom We have narrated unto thee aforetime and of others of whom We have not narrated unto thee; and unto Musa Allah spake directly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and apostles We have recounted to you earlier and apostles We have not recounted to you—and to Moses Allah spoke directly—
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Of some messengers We have already told thee the story; of others We have not;- and to Moses Allah spoke direct;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Messengers We have mentioned to you before, and Messengers We have not mentioned to you, - and to Musa (Moses) Allah spoke directly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And Messengers of whom We have narrated to you before, and Messengers of whom We did not narrate to you. Certainly, Allah talked to Moses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Some messengers We have already told you about, while some messengers We have not told you about. And God spoke to Moses directly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [We sent] messengers about whom We have related [their stories] to you before and messengers about whom We have not related to you. And Allah spoke to Moses with [direct] speech.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:164] And, We sent, messengers We have told you of before, and messengers We have not told you of: it is related that God sent eight thousand prophets [in total], four thousand [of them] from [the Children of] Israel, and [the remaining] four thousand from other peoples, as stated by the Shaykh [Jalāl al-Dīn alMahallī] in [his commentary on] sūrat Ghāfir [Q. 40:78]; and God spoke directly, without mediation, to Moses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And messengers We have mentioned unto thee) by name (before and messengers We have not mentioned) by name (unto thee; and Allah spake directly unto Moses);
